Description: Ear-ring in bone and four beads in faience A: Fragment of a ear-ring made of shell, subtle angular edges, one end broken off, eroded surface that sheds white material. B: One large disc-shaped bead made of greenish frit. C: Three parts of originally probably one segmented cylindrical bead made of faience, white.
Acquisition notes: Formerly housed by the Birmingham Museum and Art Gallery and the EES London.
